subject: Delegation of Powers to ROs for Green Highways Projects (Plantation; Transplantation; Beautification and Maintenance)
text: Ha4 <ey {Af yiferarru Q4 Phone 91-11 ~25074100/25074200 (987 Q<art aR Tatarf AaTTT) T4 / Fax 91-11-25033507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Qa 8, dae7-10, EAT, # farm-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIIPolicy Guidelines/Delegation of Powers to ROs for Green Highways Projects /2017 No: 7.4.5/2017, Dated the 17th caber, 2017 (Decision taken on File No. NHAIIGHD/02/02/23/2016/298) Sub: Delegation of Powers to ROs for  Green Highways Projects (Plantation; Transplantation, Beautification and Maintenance) With reference to the Green Highways policy guidelines circulated vide NHAI OM Circular dated 16.06.2017 , 13.07.2017 and 24.07.2017 and subsequent decision taken in 311 EC meeting dated 24.07.2017 , ROs are hereby   delegated   following powers for effective implerentation of Green Highways Projects S.No Head Delegation of Power Remarks Green Highways Full Powers to Regional Subject to vetting 0f proposal by Projects through Officers Green Highways Division Govt: Agencies Release of funds to Full Powers to Regional The mobilization and subsequent Government Officers advances as per OM no Agencies 11013//1/2K/Env-GHD/464 dated 19.07.2017 2 Green Highways Powers to Regional Project estimates to be based on Projects through Officers to approve MoRD SOR for roadside Private Agencies projects up to 10 Kms plantation released vide circular NGOs NH length no 11017/17/2008-NREGA dated 14.07.2014. Further  agencies to be selected based on Competitive Bidding on   Quality  Cost Based Selection (QCBS)  3 Release of funds to Full powers to Regional Reimbursement subject to actual" Private Agencies Officers work done and verified by PIUs NGOs Agreement   signing Full powers to PIU in Subject to approval of Regional with Govt Private charge of the project Officer Agencies area 2 This will be  applicable for ongoing as well a5 future Green Highways Projects including works of Plantation, Transplantation, Beautification and  Maintenance, till any further circular is issued.
